TextBlock.Text: OKALIS: That performance was beautiful! I never suspected that these people would have such wonderful singing voices.
NESIA: Suppose that the physiology of their vocal organs are different from ours? I fail to even imagine how one of us might create those sounds.
AZOLLA: Interesting hypothesis, Nesia, we will have to see what Sennetti can discover once he completes his analysis of these peopleâ€™s language.
OKALIS: I know it is for a good reason, but I still struggle to understand how he was willing to miss this performance to continue working. Hopefully he gets an opportunity to relax soon!
AZOLLA: I hope so too, but you know how impossible it is to distract Sennetti once he begins work on a translation.
